avail.title: 4th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
avail.author: Hickerson, Jay

links.label: Things Mysterious by James F. Widner

infos.info: Hickerson has this listed as two series. The series for the period 5/21/35-1950 was broadcast on WJR in Detroit and the series for 9/22/40-11/12/44 was broadcast on KMPC. He writes ';same format of Detroit with new casts and different scripts.'; Makes reference o the September 1994 issue of Tune In.

prints.title: 4th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The

prints.title: RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York
RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York

synopses.synopsis: Eerie stories of ghosts, weird happenings and especially gruesome murders is the format for this series.
